extends javax.swing.JPanel

The panel that contains the start and stop buttons.

The panel containing the start and stop buttons.

Method Detail

convertMilliSecondsToSliderValue

public int convertMilliSecondsToSliderValue(int milliseconds)
The time delay slider is presented in a log scale. But the slider itself is in a linear scale. Therefore milliseconds must be converted to a slider's value by adjusting from log-scale to linear-scale.

Parameters:
milliseconds - The milliseconds that will be converted to a slider value.
Returns:
A slider value.

convertSliderValueToMilliSeconds

public int convertSliderValueToMilliSeconds(int sliderValue)
The time delay slider is presented in a log scale. But the slider itself is in a linear scale. Therefore the slider's value must be converted to milliseconds by adjusting from linear-scale to log-scale.

Parameters:
sliderValue - The value returned by the slider.
Returns:
milliseconds of delay.
